column1: The Purple Pig////Some of the dishes were a little heavy on the salt
column2: but nothing the garnishes couldn't help with. Yum. We also decided on getting dessert (even though we didn't need it
column3: but we were on vacation...) He got the affogato and I got the caramel poached pear dessert. We are huge desserts people. He loved the affogato (I'm not a coffee person at all)
column4: the poached pear was STUNNING. It looked gorgeous and tasted delicious. I definitely did not need to eat most of it
column5: but that didn't stop me. I love the flavor of the poached pears
column6: and the ice cream was a delicious nice touch.
